columns.text:
Nested atop the hill overlooking the long, sandy coast stretching south of the town port, Naxos Grande Vista is a complex of three well-appointed villas in a private and tranquil setting.

Each residence boasts infinity-edge swimming pools with breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea and stunning sunsets. Modern interiors with spacious bedrooms and fully equipped kitchens blend seamlessly with the outdoor living areas, instilling a sense of relaxation.

 

THREE WELL-APPOINTED VILLAS IN A PRIVATE AND TRANQUIL SETTING.

Let our dedicated associates recommend and take care of your restaurant reservations, day cruise and activity booking, while you and your loved ones enjoy the amenities at Naxos Grande Vista.

items.title: Villa Apollo Private Villa | Sleeps 4
items.amenities:
• lower floor offers one bedroom and one bathroom
  • upper floor offers one bedroom and one bathroom
  • full kitchen, includes utensils, microwave, kettle, and dishwasher
  • large patio

items.intro_text: Villa Ariadne Private Family Villa | Sleeps 6
items.title: Villa Ariadne Private Family Villa | Sleeps 6
items.amenities:
• lower floor offers one bedroom and one bathroom
  • upper floor offers two bedrooms and one bathroom
  • fully-equipped kitchen includes utensils, microwave, kettle, espresso machine, coffee maker and dishwasher
  • bathroom with shower
  • washing machine
  • large patio
items.seo_title: Villa Ariadne Private Family Villa | Sleeps 6
items.seo_description: Villa Ariadne Private Family Villa | Sleeps 6

items.title: Villa Zas Private Villa | Sleeps 4
items.amenities:
• two bedrooms and one bathroom on the same level
  • full kitchen, includes utensils, microwave, kettle, and dishwasher
  • large rooftop patio

items.title: Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites
items.description: 50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites. The complex offers panoramic views of the pool, the garden and the Aegean Sea. The Naxian Queen constructed following the original Cycladic architecture. It is a complex of luxurious villas and suites that offer all modern amenities. The complex’s pool is great, also operates a children’s pool. Snack bar coffee can enjoy snacks and drinks. In the reception area there is a library where you can rent a book of your choice.
items.excerpt: 50 meters from the famous Agia Anna Beach, and just 5 km from the town of Naxos is located Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites.

items.intro_text: Welcome to Naxian Queen Luxury Villas & Suites

items.title: Apricot & Sea Luxury Villas Naxos
items.description: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach. With outmost respect and love for the environment of Naxos, Apricot & Sea residences are completely integrated in the ancient rocks of Orkos while the soothing sound of waves is bringing a sense of calm and relaxed atmosphere. At Apricot & Sea we are well aware that your vacation is precious and this is why our residences are fully equipped with everything you may need. However in case there is something that can make your stay even more comfortable and enjoyable all you need to do is ask for it. Prepare your senses for magical moments gazing at the endless blue of the sea and sky of our beloved island. Experience Naxos in comfort at Apricot & Sea!
items.excerpt: Apricot & Sea has created for you the ultimate combination of comfort, luxury and traditional Cycladic architecture in the gorgeous scenery of Orkos beach.
